alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 5:36PM PST until January 15 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys, Ventura County Coastal Valleys and San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 11 AM Friday to 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes the 23, 101, 118, 170, 210, and 405 freeways and Interstate 5. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty Santa Ana winds could linger into Sunday and this advisory may need to be extended.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ventura County Coastal Valleys; Ventura County Interior Valleys
